nodes.bodyText:
What I do not really like about this method is that it creates the filter manager AND then does the vertx.deployVerticle() as well. That means that at least the name is wrong!
Maybe this method is not needed at all if we just use the builder instead and do the deploy after?
The other public methods seem to have javadoc. I'm not sure how consistent we are with javadoc. What are we aiming for?
you could check whether it is equal to the logWithMetadata() log.
